channel.title: Bot fix for full q3a
channel.description: **Warning**, you need to press the **BLUE** button "Скачать" in the middle to download. Bot fix: they will use all weapons instead of gauntlet only. (Actually ZTM already made a patch for the demo of the game in github, but mine also works) https://cloud.mail.ru/public/9CMu/VbckXSYrN

item.title: Bot fix for full q3a
item.dc:creator: @ZaRR ZaRR
item.description:

Warning, you need to press the BLUE button “Скачать” in the middle to download.
Bot fix: they will use all weapons instead of gauntlet only. (Actually ZTM already made a patch for the demo of the game in github, but mine also works)
